text: Easier to access Bishan-Ang Mo Kio Park and the nearby HDB residential flat buildings. Also good for students attending Ai Tong and Eunoia Junior College as it is within walking distance. This will be converted into an interchange to Bright Hill Interchange with the Cross Island Line Stage 1 by 2030.
Very convenient for me to access the Kong Meng San Temple as itâ€™s about 5-10mins walk from station. In the past need to travel to bishan bus interchange to take feeder bus over.

Convenient to have this MRT station for Thomson east coast line to connect this part of the country to the rest.

Peaceful and quiet usually.
Nice and clean new station on the Thomson East Coast Line... and the future Cross Island Line.
Nice and cleeeeeen. Hope they open up the rest of the stations soon.
